author: andreas
content:
Franz, I'm afraid that was irony on my part. I have this one: http://www.amazon.de/DuMont-Kunst-Reisef%C3%BChrer-Emilia-Romagna-Oberitalienische-Kunstst%C3%A4dte/dp/B0026CH5WG

It's not really bad, but it just covers a much too big area. An online resource that I found pretty good is http://www.ferraraterraeacqua.it/en/
